properties.name: maxViewsNumber
properties.description: The maximum number of times an item in this usage module can be viewed

properties.name: viewLifeCycle
properties.description: The amount time an item is available for viewing since a user started watching the item

properties.name: fullLifeCycle
properties.description: The amount time an item is available for viewing

properties.name: couponId
properties.description: Identifies a specific coupon linked to this object

properties.name: waiverPeriod
properties.description: Time period during which the end user can waive his rights to cancel a purchase. When the time period is passed, the purchase can no longer be cancelled

properties.name: isWaiverEnabled
properties.description: Indicates whether or not the end user has the right to waive his rights to cancel a purchase

properties.name: isOfflinePlayback
properties.description: Indicates that usage is targeted for offline playback

properties.name: isRenewable
properties.description: Denotes whether or not this object can be renewed

properties.name: renewalsNumber
properties.description: Defines the number of times the module will be renewed (for the life_cycle period)

properties.name: priceId
properties.description: Unique identifier associated with this object's price

properties.name: discountId
properties.description: The discount module identifier of the price plan
